Ok, for all the people with the problem that the files in the folder aren't registering as .rar files.
First off, I'll just assume you have winrar (just google it if you don't). First, double klick the first file "rzr-nhl7.001". Windows will not know what to do with it and it will give you to options. 1: let the net decide, don't do this. 2: choose an option from the list of available programs on your computer. Choose the second alternativ, find "WINRAR" and the file will be opened in winrar. Then just choose to extract and there you go.

figured it out:

basically i over-extracted. if you're having problems, try this:

after you extract the initial RAR file, mount it immediately. the razor dialogue screen should start up automatically. 

follow the install steps, then copy the crack to where you installed the program (ie: program files - easports - wherever). 

if you're getting the 'insert dvd' prompt, delete the nhl07 file from your program files, and make sure the crack is in place. 

run the game.

and yet after all that...

the game is disappointing! go figure. ea hasn't made a good hockey game since 2004. 

lastly, thanks for all those who offered assistance in my previous post.

haha, folk har verkligen problem med att installera, så här gör ni:

1. packa upp den största filen/filerna.

2. mounta filen med daemon tools, om det är flera filer så byt när det behövs.

3. när ni installerat klart så ska ni öppna (inte starta automatiskt) "skivan" ni mountat genom att högerklicka på den, (tro det eller ej, många vet inte hur man gör)

4. sen FLYTTA cracken till dit den ska vara, den bör ligga i E:\crack elr nått.

och det var typ allt, om det inte funkar så behåll mounten med daemon tools, så dismounta den inte.

Since people have all those problems with the installation, it's quite easy.

1.
Unrar.
- How to unrar? Right-click on any of the "rzr-nhl7"-files and use the option "Open with" (now I don't know what this command is called in the swedish version of Windows). Then locate your Winrar file. Ie.: c:/program files/Winrar/winrar.exe
When you've told Windows to open the files with Winrar, a new window will open, just if you'd have open any other compressed file. This is the .iso-file. Drag it into any folder, where you would like it to be placed. It'll unrar all the files itself, don't worry.

2. Now that you got your .iso-file, burn it to a DVD or mount it with Daemon Tools. If you mount it, a dialoug box will open, with some Razor graphics. Here's some difference options for what to can do. First you should "Install NHL 07" and follow the installation-instructions. You'll be prompted with a new dialoug where a CD-Key is needed. Go back to the Razor dialoug and use the "Run keygen", and you'll get a CD-Key, enter the CD-Key in the installation window, and let the installation finish.
Now when the installation is complete, you'll be prompted with "Run readme, run NHL 07 and Quit". Use quit in first place. Then go back to your Razor dialoug, and run "Copy crack". Pinpoint to the location where you installed the game. Ie.: c:\program files\easports\nhl07\

3. Play. :-)

- If you get some problems with the "copy-crack-thing", the crack is inside the .iso-file. Open the .iso-file with Winrar, and it should be placed in the "Razor"-folder. Copy to your game-folder manually.
